document_data.mainbody: '''Drakens''' were small, three-headed [[dragonet]]s that inhabited the [[Calim Desert]].
document_data.Description: Drakens looked like smaller, darker-colored [[blue dragon]]s with three heads. The wings and eyes were tinged with cyan.
document_data.Behavior: Drakens were known to be irritable.
document_data.Abilities: Draken breathed lightning in {{SIAdj|60|ft|adj=long}} lines, with each head being to breathe a bolt twice a day, one at a time. Additionally, when biting with two heads at a time, they could also shock the victim with an effect akin to ''[[shocking grasp]]''. Drakens themselves were immune to electrical attacks, as well as to sleep spells.
document_data.Combat: Draken primarily used their electrical abilities and teeth in combat, never their claws.
document_data.Ecology: Drakens grew to adulthood within a year from hatching.
